text: The area of Samani Districts in Hidaka Subprefecture. is a district located in Hidaka Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 5,770 and a density of 15.84 persons per km². The total area is 364.33 km². ==Towns and villages== *Samani Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Samani District, Hokkaido
